title: Generative AI Language Modeling with Transformers
about: Dive into language modeling with transformers for generative AI applications, including training and fine-tuning.

topics.name: Language Modeling
topics.details: Building and training language models using transformers.

topics.name: Fine-Tuning
topics.details: Adapting pre-trained transformer models for specific tasks.

summary: This module explores language modeling and fine-tuning techniques for generative AI using transformer architectures.
